title: FixIt Configuration File Schema
description: Schema definition for FixIt configuration files

allow_list_rules.description: A list of rules (whether custom or from Fixit) that should be applied to the repository.

block_list_patterns.description: A list of patterns that indicate that a file should not be linted.

block_list_rules.description: A list of rules (whether custom or from Fixit) that should not be applied to the repository.

fixture_dir.description: The directory in which fixture files required for unit testing are to be found.

use_noqa.description: Defaults to False. Use True to support Flake8 lint suppression comment: noqa.

formatter.description: A list of the formatter commands to use after a lint is complete.

packages.description: The Python packages in which to search for lint rules.

repo_root.description: The path to the repository root.

inherit.description: Boolean to determine whether this config file will inherit properties from a parent config.
